channel.title: Rise with Skye Mendes
channel.description:
Feel Look Do Incredible

Be confident and dress with purpose. Change is possible. You are worthy. You are beautiful. You are enough. We need the special gift only YOU have to share with this world.

Style is an inward-outward process that encompasses and shows off every aspect of who you are: your skills, values, beliefs, personality, and heart. It’s your message to the world about who you are and what you stand for. Through Skye's signature 8-step process you'll discover and create a Style Fingerprint that aligns uniquely to who you are, your lifestyle, goals, and desires. You’ll discover your beautiful uniqueness and be motivated to live and embrace it. Discover the personal brand called YOU – Your unique superpower,

Produced by https://SolidGold.co.za — #BeHeard
channel.itunes:subtitle: Discover the personal brand called YOU – Your unique superpower,

item.itunes:author: Skye Mendes | Solid Gold Podcasts
item.title: It’s not lipstick or a dress! | Caroline Hopkins
item.itunes:title: It’s not lipstick or a dress! | Caroline Hopkins
item.itunes:subtitle: Feminine Power
item.description:
It’s not lipstick or a dress! — Feminine Power Caroline Hopkins Feminine Power has nothing to do with the dress or lipstick. More an energy! And it’s not about disregarding the masculine or putting men down. Listen in for understanding as we unpack how to harness this strength in order to live a balanced life - both internally and externally.


Connect with Caroline on LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/in/carolinehhopkins/

Music : Audiosome | Upbeat Fashion Lounge


Connect with Skye on her website and change your life https://skyemendes.com/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za

item.title: Personovation, Orgasms and Sameness | Timothy Maurice Webster
item.itunes:title: Personovation, Orgasms and Sameness | Timothy Maurice Webster
item.itunes:subtitle: Gain influence in times of pandemic
item.description:
Personovation, Orgasms and Sameness — Gain influence in times of pandemic Timothy Maurice Webster In this episode Timothy Maurice Webster, 4 times best selling author, host of the BrainAndBrand show, and a columnist for many media publications including the Daily Maverick , international personal brand philosopher, speaker and mentor speaks to host, Skye Mendes, about neuroscience behind the personal brand and that orgasms are about letting go!


Visit Timothy's website http://www.timothymaurice.com/

Music : Audiosome | Upbeat Fashion Lounge

item.author: rise@solidgold.co.za (Skye Mendes | Solid Gold Podcasts)
item.itunes:author: Skye Mendes | Solid Gold Podcasts
item.title: What’s YOUR brand saying?
item.itunes:title: What’s YOUR brand saying?
item.itunes:subtitle: The brand is YOU — own it!
item.description:
What’s YOUR brand saying? — The brand is YOU — own it! You are a brand, you are a walking, talking advertisement for yourself every day! What’s on the outside? Does it match the inside? Authentic expressions of yourself is the key to embedding personal branding into your style, listen in to make choices that are in alignment with the true you. Take the great things about you and highlight them. The brand is YOU — own it!

Music : Audiosome | Upbeat Fashion Lounge


Connect with Skye on her website and change your life https://skyemendes.com/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za

item.title: Why waste 80% more?
item.itunes:title: Why waste 80% more?
item.itunes:subtitle: What would you pay to FEEL good?
item.description:
Why waste 80% more? — What would you pay to FEEL good? How much are you spending on items to help you feel confident only to find the desired feeling is short lived, or not delivered? Find out how working with a Personal Brand Coach will get you the desired feeling whilst saving you 80% in time and money.


See some of Skye's Success Stories https:// bit.ly/2W2F4ww

Music : Audiosome | Upbeat Fashion Lounge

item.author: rise@solidgold.co.za (Skye Mendes | Solid Gold Podcasts)
item.itunes:author: Skye Mendes | Solid Gold Podcasts
item.title: 8 steps to feel irreplaceable
item.itunes:title: 8 steps to feel irreplaceable
item.itunes:subtitle: 8 Steps to YOU — Your Superpower
item.description:
8 steps to feel irreplaceable — 8 Steps to YOU — Your Superpower Stop guessing what suits you, stop wasting money on items that don’t represent your heart and enhance your beauty. Stop wasting time not feeling good enough and trying to find that feeling outside of you. In these 8 simple and empowering steps you can be the irreplaceable personal brand that you have been seeking. You are your superpower! Go inwards.


Here are a few short interviews with some of Skye's many success stories bit.ly/2Sg3Oz0


Connect with Skye on her website and change your life https://skyemendes.com/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za

item.author: rise@solidgold.co.za (Skye Mendes | Solid Gold Podcasts)
item.itunes:author: Skye Mendes | Solid Gold Podcasts
item.title: How fashion takes the attention from YOU!
item.itunes:title: How fashion takes the attention from YOU!
item.itunes:subtitle: Stylish or Fashionable?
item.description:
How fashion takes the attention from YOU! — Stylish or Fashionable? Feeling like your self-esteem and confidence need a boost? Then stop spending money on fashion. I believe that fashion has the ability to erode our self-esteem and confidence as it’s designed for the masses and not for you. Style is only for YOU, your sense of self, priceless, timeless and irreplaceable. Which would you rather action?


Success stories on Style https://bit.ly/2W5OA0E


Connect with Skye on her website and change your life https://skyemendes.com/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za

item.title: You are not the mannequin
item.itunes:title: You are not the mannequin
item.itunes:subtitle: Dress your spirit
item.description:
Your personality is the special ingredient that you bring to this dish called life. The nutritional deliciousness that is served to your audience. Without personality you have a product , with personality you have a memorable experience that cannot be copied or replaced i.e personal brand . Discover what are your style personality’s in this episode to help you can dress your irreplaceable brand. YOU , your super power !

item.author: rise@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Skye Mendes | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: Skye Mendes | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: 5 Elements why YOU are irreplaceable
item.itunes:title: 5 Elements why YOU are irreplaceable
item.itunes:subtitle: Your Brand - Your Superpower
item.description:
5 Elements why YOU are irreplaceable In this episode we focus on what Personal Branding is, and discuss the basics. We are so busy taking information in from social media and other online platforms that it can become overwhelming and we also loose our true core selves if we are consistently looking outside ourselves for acceptance and approval. Impactful personal brands have undergone great introspection and self-awareness. It’s how you distinguish yourself from others. Just like your fingerprint, there is noone else like you on this planet. That is your gift and superpower.

Music : Audiosome | Upbeat Fashion Lounge


Connect with Skye on her website and change your life https://skyemendes.com/


When you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
